name: Indoservice
description: Indoservice was established in 2019 and helps clients who want to expand or establish a business in Indonesia. We have been providing services to several local and multinational companies. Assisted by our professional team, who are years-experienced on functional practices such as legal, tax and accounting, recruitment, product registration, business license and working permits. Your business in Indonesia which start from just a plan could transform into a reality. Our knowledge in development, regulations, and market trends, in multiple industries, leads us to develop a customized strategy. Alongside clients, we give solutions for every ever-changing regulation in Indonesia.
features: Our team has expertise in multiple sectors and experience in their fields for years.
We give solutions to our clients for every corporate secretarial problem.
We offer better rates but, of course, better quality than others.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
headquarter: Jakarta Selatan, Daerah Khusus Ibukota Jakarta
Headline: Help Your Business To Grow In Indonesia
ShortDescription: Indoservice was established in 2019 and helps clients who want to expand or establish a business in Indonesia. We have been providing services to several local and multinational companies.

Highlights.name: Incorporation
Highlights.description: Setup your company in Indonesia and provide you a full service support from pre-establishment stage until post-establishment stage in accordance with applicable Indonesian Law.

Highlights.name: Stay in Indonesia
Highlights.description: Several permits for foreigners who want to stay in Indonesia, either for business purpose or leisure. Indoservice will guide you to know which permit is suitable for you.

Highlights.name: HR & Finance
Highlights.description: Indoservice will assist you in organizing your company’s bookkeeping, payroll, tax report, and finding the best candidate on behalf of you.

enhanced_description: Indoservice, established in 2019, is a professional service provider specializing in assisting local and multinational companies looking to establish or expand their business operations in Indonesia. Leveraging a team with years of experience in legal, tax, accounting, and recruitment, Indoservice offers comprehensive support. Their services encompass company incorporation, providing full support from pre-establishment to post-establishment in accordance with Indonesian law, as well as assistance with corporate secretarial matters. They also guide clients through obtaining necessary permits for foreigners staying in Indonesia for business or leisure. Furthermore, Indoservice supports HR and Finance functions by managing bookkeeping, payroll, tax reporting, and finding suitable candidates. Their expertise in Indonesian regulations and market trends allows them to develop customized strategies and provide solutions for navigating ever-changing local regulations, claiming to offer better rates and quality compared to competitors.
key_use_cases: Establishing a new business entity in Indonesia
Expanding existing business operations into Indonesia
Ensuring compliance with Indonesian legal and tax regulations
Managing corporate secretarial obligations and challenges
Obtaining necessary permits and visas for foreign employees or personnel in Indonesia
Outsourcing HR functions such as recruitment, payroll processing, and bookkeeping
Navigating complex or changing Indonesian business regulations
competitive_advantages: Experienced and expert team with years of functional practice in legal, tax, accounting, and recruitment across multiple sectors.
Claims to offer better rates and quality of service than competitors.
Deep knowledge of Indonesian development, regulations, and market trends, enabling customized strategies and solutions for changing regulations.
roi_benefits: Facilitates smooth business expansion and establishment in Indonesia.
Ensures compliance with local Indonesian regulations, thereby reducing legal and financial risks.
Provides access to experienced professionals for legal, tax, accounting, and recruitment needs.
Potentially reduces operational costs through competitive service rates.
Saves time and resources by handling complex regulatory and administrative tasks.
Aids in boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity related to staffing in Indonesia.
primary_users: Business owners looking to establish or expand in Indonesia
HR Managers of multinational companies operating in Indonesia
Finance Managers responsible for Indonesian operations
Hiring Managers seeking talent in Indonesia
compliance_features: Adherence to applicable Indonesian Law for company incorporation
Provides solutions for ever-changing regulations in Indonesia
Assistance with obtaining business licenses and working permits
Support for tax reporting and compliance
